name: Nuke 10-kt
description:
Submission for the GMTK's Game Jam 2019; a game where your enemies are the reason you're alive and chairs are actually your real nemesis. The player has 1 minute to race to defuse a nuclear warhead, however, time only passes while you're walking. You can choose one of three perks at the beggining of the game that will shape your gameplay. You can choose to interact with NPC's or not along your way, depending on your situation, however, if you do so, there's a bonus to it. Take your time, hurry up, the choice is yours, don't be late.

PD: Special thanks to Bibi.
